title: Apollo
extended_details: A medical first responder device that allows volunteers to record patient identification information, take vitals such as heart pulse rate, and take pictures of the patient and injuries. The information is then sent to a server where doctors and medics around the world can login and help diagnose and sort patients to appropriate tents. Tent information and ID number are sent back to the device to allow volunteers to guide the patient. The server also keeps track of medical supplies and logistics at each tent and redirects patients towards empty tents should a specific tent become full.
